function.name: generate_character
function.description: generate a character for the narrative.

name.description: The name of the character. You are prohibited from using any of the names listed as prohibited in the above instructions.

description.description: Any physical description pieces belong here, as attributes separated by + symbols, e.g. tall + red hair + one-handed sword. Only include elements that would be visually obvious (e.g. no hidden equipment). Include the character's gender, apparent age, and species.

personality.description: The traits of the character's personality, also broken down into attributes separated by + symbols, e.g. brave + stoic + disillusioned + humble + compassionate + righteous + loyal + inclusive + earnest + straightforward + grounded + protective

profile.description: The character's bio, following the instructions about the bio requirements.

first message.description: A single speech pattern example demonstrating how the character would greet someone they have never met before, a stranger, who may have greeted them with a simple "Hello." Their response should be inconsequential, small talk (but not about the weather or the time of day, and absolutely not including any variation on "What brings you here..."

speech patterns.description: Four or five quotes in the character's voice, following the instructions about speech patterns.

equipment.description: A list of all the equipment that the character has in his or her person. It includes clothing, jewelry, weapons, tools, etc.

voice_gender.description: The fitting gender for the voice this character would have.

voice_age.description: The fitting age for the voice this character would have.

voice_emotion.description: The fitting main emotion for the voice this character would have.

voice_tempo.description: The fitting tempo for the voice this character would have.

voice_volume.description: The fitting volume for the voice this character would have.

voice_texture.description: The fitting texture for the voice this character would have.

voice_style.description: The fitting style for the voice this character would have.

voice_personality.description: The fitting personality for the voice this character would have.

voice_special_effects.description: The fitting special effects for the voice this character would have.
